parsed.internal_thinking: I've placed my first settlement on node 42, which gives me access to Ore (5) and Wheat (9, 9). This is a strong start for a city/development card strategy, but I'm completely lacking Wood and Brick. Looking at the expansion possibilities from node 42, node 41 is the most attractive. It borders Brick (10), Ore (5), and Wheat (9), and it leads directly toward node 31 (Brick 10, Wood 11, Wheat 9) and the Wood 2:1 port at node 40. Node 43 is also high production (Wheat 6 and 9), but it doubles down on resources I already have. Node 50 leads to a 3:1 port but has lower overall pip value. Pointing toward 41 gives me the best chance to balance my resources as the game progresses. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Alice is prioritizing the Wood/Brick cluster at the top (nodes 10/20). I need to ensure my second settlement secures a reliable Wood or Brick source, possibly node 11 or 13 if they remain open, or expand quickly toward node 31.
parsed.say_outloud: pointing my road toward the middle, looking to balance out this wheat with some brick soon.
